version_description:
- We've added a brand new feature that lets you share your pictures direct to Tumblr!
- infltr is now available in Danish, Finnish and Greek.
Thank you for using infltr!
If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- New gorgeous home screen.
- Capture filtered Live Photos.
- Edit existing Live Photos & videos.
- Capture and send amazing shots directly from the iMessage App.
- Interactive introduction to learn how to filter.
- Live Photos shared on Tumblr are turned into animated GIFs.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

Thank you for using infltr!
If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

Thank you for using infltr!
If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Edit your photos from and to Dropbox.
- Use your Apple Watch to change filter and fully control the camera remotely.
- Discover a new filter everyday from infltr's Today Widget.
- Manage the toolkit from the settings.
- Access the editor without granting access to the camera and microphone.
- A variety of improvements and optimization.

Thank you for using infltr!
Get in touch: hello@infltr.com

- Save your Favorite Filters
- Filter animated GIFs
- Create GIFs out of Live Photos
- Share your GIFs online via GIPHY.
- Login via Email
- Fix crashes.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

10 new adjustment tools to enhance your photos, Live Photos, videos & GIFs:
- Saturation, brightness, contrast & filter intensity.
- Crop: 17 different presets.
- Transform: rotate, straighten, flip horizontally & vertically, perspective horizontally & vertically.
- Undo edits & view the history of your edits.

- Enhanced camera experience: change filter, saturation, brightness, contrast, vignette directly in camera mode before shooting.
- Pinch to zoom on photos in your albums & in the editor.
- Change profile picture
- Change the App language directly from the settings.
- Bug fixes & improvements.

If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Fix crashes.
- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- iOS9 support
- Bug fixes & improvements.

If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Discover new collections of filters
- Unlimited personal filters
- New professional camera options
- Capture RAW photos
- Adjust JPEG compression quality
- Additional Depth Effect & Live Photos albums
- New temperature & tint tools
- Adjust the volume of videos & Live Photos
- Add a cover picture to your profile
- Share directly to Whatsapp & Weibo
- A variety of improvements and optimization.

Thank you for using infltr!
If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- NEW: Vintage Collection
- A variety of improvements and optimization.

If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- New Depth Effect filters
- Add a different filters to the background & foreground of photos & Live Photos with Depth information.
- Capture photos with Depth (Available on devices with dual-camera)

- Support for the new Files App
- Edit the photos stored in the Files App.

- Share directly from the editor.
- Long press in the editor or camera to view the original version.
- Search, manage & order albums.
- From the camera roll, revert a filtered photos to its original version.
- Drag & drop on iPad
- Improved iMessage App
- Update to support iOS11
- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- New tool to adjust the Hue of your photos, videos, Live Photos, animated GIFs & Depth photos.
- Create folders to group & classify your filters.
- New camera mode that let you choose a different style for the Background & Foreground when capturing Depth photos.
- Now you can dynamically define the boundary between the Background & Foreground of your Depth photos. Try it, it’s super cool!
- Update for the new iPhone X.
- Fix crashes.
- A variety of improvements and optimization.

Love from the infltr team.
If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

Depth editing requires iOS 11 and photos containing depth information captured with a dual-camera (iPhone 7 Plus, 8 Plus or iPhone X) running iOS 11. Depth photos captured with iOS 10 are not eligible as the depth metadata are not saved within the photos.

- Record filtered videos from the camera.
- When recording a video, double tap to flip camera. Try it, it's awesome!
- New sharpen tool.
- The new Color tool lets you add a solid color on top of your photos, videos, Live Photos, animated GIFs & Depth photos.
- 25 color blend modes.
- Automatically straighten your photos backed by Artificial Intelligence.
- Share your videos directly to Instagram.
- Fix crashes.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

Thank you for using infltr!
Get in touch: hello@infltr.com

- Fully redesigned editor!
- AI-powered smart cropping that finds objects in the images in one tap.
- New export option to save directly to your files from the editor.

- Update to support iOS13
- Major design update to support Dark Mode!
- Enjoy Infltr in Arabic, Hebrew & Catalan

Did you know?
Infltr lets you convert videos into Live Photos, ideal to create your own Live Wallpaper!

If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- 错误修复和改进。

让我们了解你的想法：hello@infltr.com

- Celebrate Pride with New Rainbow Effects!
- A variety of improvements and optimization.

Did you know?
Infltr is the only App that lets you crop, straighten and rotate videos!

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- 6 new powerful editing tools: fade, save highlights, save shadows, highlights tint, shadows tint and exposure.
Now, you can manage, order and hide editing tools.

- Introducing a new camera mode to snap Animated GIFs.
Choose the speed and duration of the GIF.
You can also choose if the GIF will loop forever or ping-pong.

- New way to reset all adjustments in camera mode.
- Improved Live Photos editing. No more crash.

- When possible, the new HEIC image format is used instead of the old JPEG.
For videos, the new codec H.265 is used when possible instead of H.264!
These new formats will save you 50% on storage without any loss in quality.

If you enjoy infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Introducing «Moment», a new type of media which you will find in a new album inside infltr.
Using a smart detection algorithm infltr automatically creates beautiful Moments using your photos on your device.
Enjoy whatching your dearest memories, edit them and share them with your love ones.

- New grain tool with 5 different dusty styles.
They can be flipped & rotated.

- 7 interactive color shift modes.

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.
Thank you for using infltr!

- We’re proud to be celebrating Pride this year with a new Pride effect. Share the love and add the new rainbow filter to your Photos, Videos, Live Photos, Animated GIFs or Depth Photos.

- The hue tool gained an intensity slider which gives you more control.
- Fix crashes.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com
Happy Pride

- We’re proud to be celebrating Pride this year with a new Pride effect. Share the love and add the new rainbow filter to your Photos, Videos, Live Photos, Animated GIFs or Depth Photos.

- The hue tool gained an intensity slider which gives you more control.
- Fix crashes.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com
Happy Pride

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

We are excited to introduce Infltr Pro in this milestone update!

- Upgrade for iOS12 and the new iPhones.
- Better Depth with Portrait Matte in camera & editor on iOS12.
- Add blur to the background of your Depth Photos.

- New selective Hue, Saturation & Lightness tool.
- 4 new Color Shift modes.
- Improved Hue tool.

- Share directly to your Instagram Story.
- Quick access to your latest Moments from the home screen, just scroll down.

- Faster & slicker Camera Roll.
- Full redesign & improvements.

If you enjoy infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

Happy Halloween
We're excited to be celebrating Halloween this year with a new spooky effect.

A variety of improvements and optimization.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

If you have a question, contact us: hello@infltr.com

- Take full advantage of iOS12 by creating Siri Shortcuts from the Settings screen.
- Totally new Today Widget showing your latest animated Moments!
- A variety of improvements and optimization.
+ 5 grainy textures which can be rotated & flipped.

If you enjoy infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Making the video editor even better with a new tool that lets you Trim your Videos!
- New shortcut button to Share directly from the editor for Infltr Pro users.
+ Watch-out for Black Friday Deals!

We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any comments or suggestions, email us at hello@infltr.com or message us on Instagram at @infltr

- Merry Christmas!
Our Christmas filters are out! it is a fun way to create your own Christmas cards!

- New powerful Double Exposure tool with 24 different Blend Modes.
It lets you rotate, straighten and flip the image that you are blending
Try to replace the background of a depth photo with any other photo. Awesome way to teleport yourself from a rainy scenary to a sunny beach!

- We re-wrote our Video & Live Photo rendering pipeline to be more robust & faster.
- 3 new Color Shift modes.
- Copy and Paste filters from one image to another!
- New hidden photo album.
- Hide and Unhide photos.

If you enjoy infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

Valetine's Day
Surprise your other half; try our new Valentine's Day filters now. They are fun, cutre & romantic!

Love from the infltr team.

- Bug fixes & improvements.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

圣帕特里克节
我们推出了圣帕特里克节日滤镜，欢迎使用！

如果你有问题，请联系我们：hello@infltr.com

- 错误修复和改进。

让我们了解你的想法：hello@infltr.com

- 你现在可以将已经保存的滤镜标记为收藏，从而更快地使用。
- 改进了 iPad 上的首页画面，放大 iPhone 上横向显示画面。 你的相簿现在会显示在照片旁边。
- 可以更方便地从编辑器分享了。
- 新的色彩转换样式，用于创造色差。
- 大多数字体会根据你的设备自行调整尺寸！
- 印度的朋友现在可以在 Infltr 中使用印地语了。
- 各种改进和优化。

如果你喜欢 Infltr，请在 App Store 中留下好评。
如果你有问题，请联系我们：hello@infltr.com

错误修复和改进。

你知道吗?
Infltr是唯一可以让你裁剪、拉伸和旋转视频内容的应用程序！

感谢你使用 Infltr！

错误修复和改进。

加上滤镜的照片能够在社交网络上收获更多的赞和评论！

感谢你使用 Infltr！

Bug fixes & improvements.

Did you know?
Filtered photos get more likes and comments on social networks!

Thank you for using Infltr!

- Convert videos into Live Photos. Perfect to create Live Wallpaper for your iPhone.
- New crop preset matching the screen of your device. Also great to create Live Wallpaper.

- Infltr is now available in 28 languages. New languages include: Czech, Hungarian, Romanian, Slovak, Ukrainian!

We love hearing your ideas and feedback. If you have any comments or suggestions, email us at hello@infltr.com or message us on Instagram at @infltr

Bug fixes & improvements.

Let's celebrate together with creative photography #Infltr.
It is a fun way to create your own christmas cards!

Get in touch: hello@infltr.com

New super powerful light leaks tool including 53 effects
You'll find them in the Overlay section of the editor

Improved text tool.
- Save your own text styles
- Import custom fonts within the text tool
- Install the text tool fonts to your device and make them available to other apps

Also in this update:
- Now you can add Bitmoji stickers!
- Long press on any tool, style or preset to re-order or hide it.

Let us know what you think: hello@infltr.com

- Link Infltr to your Snapchat & Bitmoji account from the Settings screen to enjoy a better sharing experience.
Add Bitmoji stickers when sharing to Snapchat

- New compelling Gradient Overlay tool. Perfect to add some depth & energy to your shots!

- New pack of stickers: Cactus

Get in touch: hello@infltr.com
If you enjoy Infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Introducing a new auto-randomized feature!
It works within many tools including light leak, grain, gradient..
Tap to shuffle the presets until you get the look you want.

- We've integrated with Unsplash
You can browse and search free high-resolution photos from Unsplash.
These can be edited or added within the double-exposure tool!

- Link Infltr to your Snapchat & Bitmoji account from the Settings screen to enjoy a better sharing experience.
Add Bitmoji stickers when sharing to Snapchat

- You can now choose which media type to export or share!

- Accessing your photo albums is much faster.
You can now delete photo albums

We made major changes in the core of the App to make it faster and stronger! If you find something a bit off, please tell us: hello@infltr.com

- New music tool to add background tracks to your videos.
- New pack of stickers: Birthday
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

If you enjoy Infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Infltr is now available on the Mac!
Enjoy the best editor & filter creator on your laptop or desktop.
Bonus: it is free!

- Improved Snapchat & TikTok sharing.

- New media overlay tool.
It lets you overlay photos on top of others.
You can choose the shape of your overlay out of 360 styles.

- New pack of stickers: Summer
- We've added many shortcuts, long press hard on items like stickers to discover them.
- Redesign of the filters discovery screen.

If you enjoy Infltr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.
